activities: WorldCompliance Inc. receives from its customers and affiliates’ customers their clients’ personal information to provide screening against sanctions and due diligence lists to support such customers’ compliance with anti-money laundering (AML) and due diligence requirements.  When performing these services and related customer support activities, including technical support, WorldCompliance Inc. is receiving and processing the personal information under the direction of the customers. WorldCompliance Inc. also receives and processes personal information pertaining to its customers and its affiliates’ customers’ personnel to provide and improve its services, customer support and marketing activities.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Off-line, on-line, manually processed customer and client data
